entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
